name: Snappy Title Text!
body: Dark 'Vex' Vexon Home of the Vexon Friend me on Steam! Greetings! Welcome to my website, home of me, the ostensibly awesome and absoultely cool DarkVexon! This is in the early stages, but later there will be links to my blog, and more!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
